meanings.definition: Sterilizers: devices used to kill or remove all microorganisms from an object or surface.
meanings.sent1: The hospital uses sterilizers to make sure all the equipment is clean and safe.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory technician operated the sterilizers to sanitize the tools.
meanings.sent3: The sterilizers at the dentist's office work hard to keep germs away from the tools.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous cleaning habits were like sterilizers, ensuring everything was spotless.
meanings.sent5: The steam from the sterilizers billowed out, purifying the room.

meanings.definition: Sterilizers: individuals or machines that sterilize objects or surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The sterilizers in the factory were always busy cleaning the products.
meanings.sent2: She hired professional sterilizers to disinfect her home after the renovation.
meanings.sent3: The little robot acted like a superhero, zapping germs as it moved around like a sterilizer.
meanings.sent4: The team of cleaners worked together like a well-oiled machine, just like sterilizers.
meanings.sent5: The sterilizers hummed softly, their work unnoticed but essential for safety.
